snippet: India batsman Karun Nair reflected on his brush with death this year after scoring a brilliant triple century against England in the fifth test on Monday....
lead_paragraph: India batsman Karun Nair reflected on his brush with death this year after scoring a brilliant triple century against England in the fifth test on Monday.

headline.main: Survivor Nair Rides Luck Again in Epic Innings
headline.print_headline: Survivor Nair Rides Luck Again in Epic Innings
